analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x8041cf5c01ac5b3d4557410df2bf1ae054472ccf.sol:
	Contract SparkPoint has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x8041cf5c01ac5b3d4557410df2bf1ae054472ccf.sol#229)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x8041cf5c01ac5b3d4557410df2bf1ae054472ccf.sol#91) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of SparkPoint.burn (/unique_contracts/0x8041cf5c01ac5b3d4557410df2bf1ae054472ccf.sol#212) is not in mixedCase
